bug.author: yqwang-ms
bug.description:
Current doc is wrong: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/pai/blob/master/docs/manual/cluster-admin/how-to-set-up-virtual-clusters.md>https://github.com/microsoft/pai/blob/master/docs/manual/cluster-admin/how-to-set-up-virtual-clusters.md</denchmark-link>
Previous correct doc is deleted unexpectedly: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/pai/blob/513d0104cb38b56cf6f6b4226d70d2db1536ee71/docs/hivedscheduler/devops.md>https://github.com/microsoft/pai/blob/513d0104cb38b56cf6f6b4226d70d2db1536ee71/docs/hivedscheduler/devops.md</denchmark-link>
Delete in PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/pai/pull/4545>#4545</denchmark-link> without any HiveD dev reviewed Pls note the operation order is important. +Release manager <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Binyang2014>@Binyang2014</denchmark-link> to aware
